Even though I press "recommend the game" I have to confess I did not have great time with it and was doing a playthrough just to get familiar with "legendary video games series".

I understand the universal praise the game gets and its role, influence on the scene but it is just not my cup of tea. The last levels, especially the alien areas just devastated my patience and determination. The platforming, jumping around, running, slipping off, everything was such a damn slug to force yourself through. Navigating areas became so annoying I have to admit I was on a brink of dropping game.
The mindfookery of story, atmosphere, sound work and alien thematics of levels in itself were amazing.
 
All in all, I'd recommend it if you have patience and determination and really really want to get familiar with one of the most well known games ever, then go for it. if not, then absolutely do not loathe yourself.

[h1]"Quite a nasty piece of work you managed over there..."[/h1]

Тут я могу лишь сказать, что первая Халва - это не просто классика (которую знать надо!), но самый настоящий [b]chad[/b] (один из) среди всех игр. Динамичная история, мощный саундтрек и эмбиент, культовые [strike]мемы[/strike] цитаты, возможность [i]disable HD models[/i] для полной аутентичности. Из минусов разве что топорность, являющаяся эхом прошлого. Игра достаточно сложная, не прощающая ошибок, но в этом и есть смысл: полное погружение в события глобальной катастрофы. Крепкая классика.

[h1]Моя оценка:[/h1] [b]8 из 10[/b]

É um clássico da ficção cientifica e embora não seja pra todo mundo, ainda é um dos melhores jogos que eu ja joguei na minha vida, é incrivel como esse jogo consegue me entreter até hoje, pra quem gosta de um Shooter rápido e frenético, o game é pra você, se você é mais cauteloso e conservador com a sua munição, esse jogo também é pra você, qualquer tipo de playstyle funciona aqui, sem falar na liberdade que o jogo dá, você pode salvar seu colegas, ou matar geral, no final das contas você faz o que quiser e eu amo essa liberdade.

[b]TOO SCARY!![/b]
so i know i have 7 hores on this game, but after the 7th i literally uninstalled on the spot. I thought this game would was gonna be just cool badass fun action like Doom, but as it turns turned out, this game is scary as FUCK! i couldnt get through half the game without my eyes close closed, there are too many JUMPSCARES! for example the "head crabs" in the vents (there were like 12 of those hoes), but the thing that made me uninstall on the spot like i said is the big Green monster with the claws, after he killt the scientist I couldnt take it so I uninstalled. I know this games supposed to be some classic essential or something but if u cant handle the heat, don't play it.

edit: grammar and spelling, also stop leaving "found this review funnies", I'M SEROUSE!

If ever there was a game that I thought the title "the Citizen Kane of video games" was an accurate description, it would be this game. Just like Citizen Kane revolutionized how stories were told in movies, Half Life revolutionized how stories were told in games. It shows how the story can unfold around you in an interactive medium rather than being shoved in your face through cutscenes. Truly a game everyone should play.
P.S. If you are a first time player, here's a tip: Don't play on hard for your first playthrough. I did and it seriously hindered my experience, as I wasn't familiar enough with the game yet. I still enjoyed the game, but still, play on normal first

Pomimo lat da się dalej grać ale i tak widać upływ czasu. Fabuła jest ciężka do śledzenia, strzelaniny potrafią być frustrujące, często da się zgubić i utknąć na etapie na jakiś czas, ostatni boss był strasznie frustrujący. Pomimo tych problemów dalej rozgrywka może dawać dobrą zabawę. PS. To jest oryginalna wersja gry która działa na silniku GoldSrc. Od wersji Half:life Source polecam trzymać się z daleka gdyż port ten jest strasznie skopany

I LOVE this game!  The story is great.  The graphics are great.  Game play is smooth and there is no latency.  I can't wait to get started on Half Life 2 !  I highly recommend this game.  Enjoy the mayhem!  There are also tons of fun secret areas, some of which I stumbled upon and the expert players didn't even have them in their walkthroughs.  Nicely done Valve.

#RememberFreeman

This game is older than me but it still somehow holds up. Yeah the game looks old but don't let graphics distract you. Gameplay is still great and I didn't have any issues with that, maybe jumping was kinda hard sometimes but even newer games don't get it sometimes right. Other than that I had a great time killing big variety of aliens that the game was throwing at me. Story is small and there's a lot of mystery, but I don't think it's a weak point, there's just not much talking and most of the time you have to figure out by yourself what's going on. Overall I highly recommend it, it's not without a reason called one of the best games ever made and for it's time it sure was!
im not a fan of the jump and run parts in the game but i love the rest of the game

It's a classic, revolutionary milestone for gaming. Unfortunately, it is dated mechanically (movement, physics-based puzzle-solving, combat, etc.) and doesn't have the best optimization for modern pcs and windows 10; it stutters a lot. Black Mesa is a superior experience, especially if you bring Xen to the conversation. It is still fun if you are looking for a product of the 90s era though
